report.title: Species, Occurrence and Image Counts
report.description: Gives a total number of species, occurrence and photos for a filter (e.g. a survey/date range).
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND o.zero_abundance='f' AND o.record_status <> 'R'

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: currentUser
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. If ownData=1 then used to filter the records.
